name: Edward L. KERNER and Catherine Kerner, his wife v. Donald G. REXRODE, Appellant

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: Edward L. KERNER and Catherine Kerner, his wife v. Donald G. REXRODE, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeals dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John S. Carnes, Jr., West Chester, for Donald G. Rexrode.
Larry J. Folmar, Norristown, for Edward L. and Catherine Kerner.
casebody.head_matter:
709 A.2d 905
